creator: hanasaki@hanaden.com
text: enhancement to mail / email smtp task to support smtp over tls/ssl

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
Is this part of JavaMail? Are you able/willing to write all the code to do this
if not?

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
A quick Google search of the keywords TLS SSL Java has brought me to this link :
http://james.apache.org/usingTLS_2_1.html
I read there than an API called JSSE is the foundation for TLS SSL in Java.
Another search concerning JavaMail and JSSE brought me to this link :
http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/javatips/jw-javatip115.html which might be 
directly usable to fix this bug report in the case of JavaMail.

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
I plan to implement the smtp over tls/ssl in the MimeMailer, making it available 
for the EmailTask (<mail/>) and for the MailLogger. I do not have plans for 
plain mail.

implemented for <mail> and maillogger, using the JavaMail API.
Will be in the next nightly build.
creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de

text:
I mark this bug as fixed, and will welcome feedback if someone tries the 
enhanced <mail/> task or the MailLogger with SMTP over TLS/SSL.
Cheers - Antoine.
